amendment.description: To establish a pilot program for digital and wireless networks to advance online higher education opportunities for minority students.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3263 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3263 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Pryor. (consideration: CR S12845-12846; text: CR S12845-12846) To establish a pilot program for digital and wireless networks to advance online higher education opportunities for minority students.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3263 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3263 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Pryor.
